item.description:
Inbound Marketing (also called Content Marketing) is where you "wind up" your website so it attracts your crowd and converts some of them into prospects for your business.

The basic principal behind Inbound Marketing is that it is fundamentally easier AND CHEAPER to make it easy for your prospects to find you, than it is for you to keep going out and finding them.

The good news is, it really is. It's amazing how well this works.

It is not nearly as hard as people think, HOWEVER to be effective it must be done right. The only time I've ever seen it fail is when people changed the system and deviated from how we teach them to do it. I know that may sound egotistical, but we are really good at this AND anyone can do it.

If your business needs visibility and leads, you need to learn how to do this.

This is an eight part series that teaches you in detail how you can do this too.

These are webinars. The URLs for each session are listed below.

The sessions are:
May 14: Overview (the basics of the system)
https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/register/707842846081865728

May 21: Keyword analysis (attracts your crowd a little faster)
https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/register/7243584053163788544

May 28: Content and publishing (this is where the rubber meets the road)
https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/register/3438639402849606656

Jun 4: Link management (Google does not actually rank pages, they rank links)
https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/register/4258612293891469056

May 11: Engagement (when you follow they system, they will come)
https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/register/5280589660211592960

May 18: Conversion (my personal favorite)
https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/register/6093824743998443264

Jun 25: Agility (you're probably wondering what this even means)
https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/register/6662660383163244288

Jul 2: Wordspress settings (some are absolutely essential)
https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/register/3013896961528132352
item.name: Inbound Marketing, Website Visibility and Lead Generation
